custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT primKey FROM ResourcePermission WHERE (companyId = ?) AND ( (name = CAST_TEXT('com.liferay.portlet.documentlibrary.model.DLFileEntry')) OR (name = CAST_TEXT('com.liferay.portlet.documentlibrary.model.DLFolder')) ) AND (scope = ?) AND [$TYPE_PKS$] AND (MOD(actionIds, 2) = 1) AND [$ROLE_IDS_OR_OWNER_ID$]
